content: Update backend models: Destination, Article, HeroCarousel, Testimonial, Partner, Inquiry, Settings with UUID and timezone-aware datetimes
Implement all backend API endpoints: CRUD for destinations, articles, heroes, partners, testimonials, inquiries with proper Pydantic models
Create mock Instagram endpoint returning 3 sample posts
Create seed data endpoint to populate 10 destinations, 5 articles, 6 hero slides, 3 partners
Update frontend index.css with design tokens (fairway green, gold accent, Playfair/Karla fonts)
Create base Layout component with Header (navigation + demo buttons) and Footer
Build Homepage: HeroCarousel, featured destinations grid, editorial strip, trust bar, CTA band
Build Destinations pages: listing with filters + detail page with gallery and inquiry CTA
Build Articles pages: listing + detail with category filters
Build Contact/Inquiry form with validation and Sonner toasts
Build comprehensive Admin Dashboard: tabs for Content, Destinations, Articles, Inquiries with CRUD operations
Implement demo auth buttons (Client/Admin) with localStorage flags and route guards
Add SEO foundations: sitemap.xml, robots.txt endpoints, alt text, canonical patterns
Test complete user flow and take screenshots to verify UI matches design guidelines
